question: Baba Amte is known for which of the following social work?
explanation: Murlidhar Devidas Amte also known as Baba Amte was an Indian social worker and social activist from the state of present Maharashtra. He was famous for his contribution for the rehabilitation and empowerment of people who had been suffering from leprosy. He won Padma Vibhushan, Dr. Ambedkar International Award, Gandhi Peace Prize, Ramon Magsaysay Award, Jamnalal Bajaj Award, Templeton Prize. He is popularly called as the modern Gandhi of India.
